title: June NFT market shake-up: Ethereum reigns, Bitcoin falters
description: There’s a surprising shift in the ether winds of the non-fungible token (NFT) realm as Ethereum solidifies its dominance while Bitcoin’s momentum ebbs. In this article, we take an illuminating journey into the depths of the NFT market landscape as it stood in June 2023. Ethereum ascends as Bitcoin descends Ethereum-based NFTs made a mark ... Read more
